translation: Wherever a being is born, whether unmoving or moving, know thou, O best of the Bharatas (Arjuna), that it is from the union of the field and its knower.
commentary: 13.27 until whatever? Sanjayate is born? Something any? Sattvam being? immovable the unmoving and the moving? from the union between the field and the knower of the field? That that? Viddhi know? Bharatarshabha O best of the Bharatas.Commentary O Arjuna? remember that whatever is born? unmoving or moving? know thou that to be done to the union between the body and the Self.The
